Imagine

  • Learn More

Introducing the ultimate robot
for making the world a better place


The first of its kind.

10 hours in one charge

Just plug it in for 2 hours and you'll get 10 hours of LitterBot runtime! Just set it and forget it.

Real-time Analytics

There's no need to monitor the LitterBot. It's perfectly safe and you'll receive notifications and analytics to let you know what LitterBot is up to.

Cloud-enabled

Using ultra-amazing CloudMinds technology, LitterBot packs a big punch in a small package. Ultra-intelligent AI runs in the cloud to help LitterBot make places ultra-clean.

Secure

Worried someone will vandalize LitterBot? There's no need to worry. LitterBot has built-in ray guns that will vaporize anyone who messes with it.

Built with love

LitterBot is the brainchild of a group of Carnegie Mellon Robotics Institute graduate students. Coming from varied backgrounds, they've built the state-of-the-art in litter collection technology.

  • Learn More

Proven technology

With a partnership from the Carnegie Mellon University custodial services, LitterBot will have reached 100 hours of production-level testing by June 2017.

  • Learn More
